title: Having complications with changing my password i need help
body: I wanted to change my password but i'm having a unique complication between a old email account that isn't supported and a old phone number I no longer have.

replies.body: Don't worry if you don't have access to your old email, we're happy to help!  Just reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our account team can make updates.  You'll need to do some brief verification, and we'll take it from there.  We'll respond to the ticket as soon as we can!

So I did put in a ticket, however, a unknown user ended up on my account and sending a link (the link i opened not knowing what it is) that got my account hacked in the first place. I'm concerned of them being on my account again and either trying to send the same link that was sent to me, or having them mess with my account. Is there anything specific i can do for the time being while the support ticket goes through?
